bwwExcerpt: But polished performances, slick choreography (by Sergio Trujillio) and a slate of 31 Motown tunes should satisfy audiences who might not be looking for probing storytelling, as long as the show delivers well-performed hits. That it does, as it centers on the story of the classic quintet of performers singing "Cloud Nine," "If You Don't Know Me By Now," "My Girl," "I'm Gonna Make You Love Me" and the title song, among others - including some songs that weren't the group's own. Roma Torre, NY1: T
